{{Quote|When [[Durin IV|Durin]] grows suspicious of the [[Seven Rings|Dwarven Rings]], [[Celebrimbor]] must reassess his priorities. Amidst [[Númenor]]'s shifting currents, [[Elendil]] searches for hope.|Official Synopsis, [[Amazon Studios]]}}

'''Halls of Stone''' is the thirteenth episode of [[Amazon Studios]]'s television series, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]''. It is the fifth episode of the second season and it was released on [[12 September|September 12]], [[2024]].
